name: Nuclear Bulwark
description:
/!\ Please set scaling to 100% in windows display settings or it can mess with Unity Render Pipeline /!\

Extra-galactic conflict!

Fend off against alien enemies while you mine uranium to feed your power plant!   Use your resources to buy stronger arsenal and repel the invaders!

Controls 🎮

Click on the power plant to generate resources  
Click on enemies to attack them 
Trade resources for upgrades

Press Esc or Space to pause 

Credits 👨‍👨‍👦‍👦
